name: Kantra the Cyclone

skills.name: Bane Hatchet
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 40% chance of stealing 1 random buff from the target.

effects.notes: 40% chance per hit to steal 1 random buff.

skills.notes: Great for stripping buffs and multi-hit utility.

skills.name: Chaos Tempest
skills.description: Attacks all enemies 3 times. Each hit has a 50% chance of placing one of the following debuffs for 2 turns: Block Buffs, Decrease ATK, Decrease SPD, Weaken, Decrease ACC, or Heal Reduction.

effects.notes: 50% chance per hit to place one of: Block Buffs, Decrease ATK, Decrease SPD, Weaken, Decrease ACC, Heal Reduction.

skills.notes: Excellent for mass debuffing and Hydra control.

skills.name: No Escape
skills.description: Decreases each enemy’s ACC by 10 for each debuff they are under. This Champion receives 4% less damage for each debuff on the attacker. Heals this Champion by 1,250 HP each time a debuff expires on an enemy. 75% chance of placing Provoke for 1 turn on enemies under 5+ debuffs at the start of this Champion’s turn. Can place debuffs on weak hits.

effects.notes: Decreases ACC by 10 for each debuff on enemy.
Receives 4% less damage for each debuff on attacker.
Heals 1,250 HP each time a debuff expires on an enemy.
75% chance to place Provoke for 1 turn on enemies under 5+ debuffs at start of turn.
Can place debuffs on weak hits.

skills.notes: Incredible for Hydra, Doom Tower, and debuff-heavy teams.

forms.aura: Increases Ally ACC in all Battles by 60.
forms.comments: Kantra is a top-tier debuffer and control champion for Hydra, Doom Tower, and Faction Wars. Her passive makes her extremely tanky and disruptive.
